1. Open both the sample project and your project in separate windows.
2. Go to the sample project's common events page.
3. Highlight the action sequence(s) that you would like to copy over.
4. Right click and Copy or Ctrl + C
5. Go to your project's common events page.
6. Right click and Paste or Ctrl + V (be careful not to overwrite your own common events).
7. Follow the same directions to copy the skills in the sample project (note: make sure that
the Skill's Common Event matches the Common Event of the action sequence.
Follow the directions within the VisuStella Wiki to link your skills to the
8. Make sure you have the Visustella Battle Core (Included in their sample project)
Need help? Drop by the RPG Beta Testers Discord Server!
A portion of the server is dedicated to RPGM action sequences help and feedback.
